data.name: Hidden Deep - Supporter Pack
data.detailed_description:
Hidden Deep - Supporter Pack


The supporter pack contains a selection of goodies for Hidden Deep, for all those who want to show extra support for the game's indie developer.

Contents

  • An exclusive rifle skin in game
  • An exclusive spray can to leave decals in game. Glam up those cave walls!
  • The Hidden Deep comic: 18 hand-illustrated pages, shining light on the back story of the Hidden Deep universe!
  • Optional "VHS camera filter" in game to give it and oldschool vibe (coming very soon!)

Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for your support!

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
